clearServices().documentation: Remove all services from the list of provided services.

getResponses().name: getResponses()

getService(java.util.UUID).name: getService(java.util.UUID)
getService(java.util.UUID).documentation:
Returns a {@link BluetoothGattService} from the list of services offered by this device.

If multiple instances of the same service (as identified by UUID) exist, the first instance of the service is returned. @param uuid uuid of service

getServices().name: getServices()
getServices().documentation: Returns a list of GATT services offered by this device.

getWrittenBytes().name: getWrittenBytes()
getWrittenBytes().documentation: Get a copy of the list of bytes that have been received.

isClosed().documentation: Get whether server has been closed.

notifyDisconnection(android.bluetooth.Bl.name: notifyDisconnection(android.bluetooth.BluetoothDevice)
notifyDisconnection(android.bluetooth.Bl.documentation:
Simulate a successful Gatt Server Disconnection with {@link BluetoothConnectionManager}.
Performs a {@link BluetoothGattCallback#onConnectionStateChange} if available, even when device
was not connected initially.

@param device remote device
